properties.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 8 at 1:48PM CST until January 10 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph
possible.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis.

* WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines.
Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be
difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe
turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying
light aircraft.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
